title: Workshop on Digital Methodologies and Feminist Research Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of mathematical statistics and data collection methodologies
context.additional_context: An intensive workshop for working professionals (administrative/managerial) enrolled in secondary educational institutions, exploring the intersection of digital tools and feminist research design

learning_goals: Participants can explain research designs that apply feminist principles of 'care' and 'participation' in the data collection process
Participants can analyze ethical dilemmas arising during data extraction from vulnerable populations and propose solutions
Participants can mathematically model the political dimensions of digital data representation and incorporate them into research designs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
